amendment.description: To provide funds for certain emergency and moral communications programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 812 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 812 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S6897-6898; text: CR S6897-6898) To provide funds for certain emergency and moral communications programs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 812 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 812 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
